title: On greedy approximation in complex Banach spaces
abstract:
The general theory of greedy approximation with respect to arbitrary
dictionaries is well developed
  in the case of real Banach spaces. Recently, some of results proved for the
Weak Chebyshev Greedy Algorithm (WCGA) in the case of real Banach spaces were
extended to the case of complex Banach spaces. In this paper
  we extend some of known in the real case results for other than WCGA greedy
algorithms to the case of complex Banach spaces.
